member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.IISPlatformHandler.IISPlatformHandlerOptions.AutomaticAuthentication
member.summary: If true the authentication middleware alter the request user coming in and respond to generic challenges. If false the authentication middleware will only provide identity and respond to challenges when explicitly indicated by the AuthenticationScheme.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.IISPlatformHandler.IISPlatformHandlerOptions.FlowWindowsAuthentication
member.summary: If true authentication middleware will try to authenticate using platform handler windows authentication If false authentication middleware won't be added

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.IISPlatformHandler.IISPlatformHandlerOptions.AuthenticationDescriptions
member.summary: Additional information about the authentication type which is made available to the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IISPlatformHandlerMiddlewareExtensions.UseIISPlatformHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds middleware for interacting with the IIS HttpPlatformHandler reverse proxy module. This will handle forwarded Windows Authentication, request scheme, remote IPs, etc..

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IISPlatformHandlerMiddlewareExtensions.UseIISPlatformHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.IISPlatformHandler.IISPlatformHandlerOptions})
member.summary: Adds middleware for interacting with the IIS HttpPlatformHandler reverse proxy module. This will handle forwarded Windows Authentication, request scheme, remote IPs, etc..

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IISPlatformHandlerMiddlewareExtensions.UseIISPlatformHandler(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNet.IISPlatformHandler.IISPlatformHandlerOptions)
member.summary: Adds middleware for interacting with the IIS HttpPlatformHandler reverse proxy module. This will handle forwarded Windows Authentication, request scheme, remote IPs, etc..

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.SecurityHelper
member.summary: Helper code used when implementing authentication middleware

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.SecurityHelper.MergeUserPrincipal(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal,System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Add all ClaimsIdentities from an additional ClaimPrincipal to the ClaimsPrincipal Merges a new claims principal, placing all new identities first, and eliminating any empty unauthenticated identities from context.User
